title: BEARD GAINS Avengers Incredible Hulk Wooden Beard Comb | Men's Accessories | Pocket Sized Portable Beard Shaping Tool | Style and Groom Facial Hairs | MADE IN USA
features: Beard Grooming: Compact size allows for portability wherever you go. Whether your shirt or pants pocket, always ready when your beard needs a touch up. Not to mention a great conversation piece and additional bragging rights on why your beard is better.

Beard Shaping: 3 Stage hand sanded to furniture grade smoothness. Our rose wood gloss beard combs are flexible wide tooth that can get through any hair or beard thickness. That means less painful snags, and combing for an easier beard control experience.

Hair and Beard Care: Individually stress tested to confirm structural integrity. Means our grooming combs are not only for your beard and mustache but also the hair on your head. 100% handmade and crafted beard care products for men by men who use them.

Beard Styling: Extra strength high gloss coated wood comb means longer lasting than your average mens wooden comb. With this coating; you get an easier brush, keep damaging elements out of your comb and increase strength by adding extra flexibility.

Handmade Combs: What makes our combs so special is the process. It takes 5 coats and 18 days on each comb to get the nice gloss protectant coating. This provides an easier stroke through your facial hair so there is less pulling of hairs and split ends.
